images.name: BRO 42069/BSC/65
images.description: Promotional photo of folk singer Fred Wedlock (to the left) and clarinettist Bernard Stanley "Acker" Bilk, Bristol docks, 1985 - both hit songwriters in their own right. Photo courtesy of George Gallop. From the George Gallop Collection.

name: Fred and Ack
description:
Folk singer Fred Wedlock (to the left) and clarinettist Bernard Stanley 'Acker' Bilk, enjoying each other's company, Bristol docks, 1985. Both men were hit songwriters in their own right. 

Photo courtesy of George Gallop. From the George Gallop Collection.

parent.name: Fred Wedlock - 'The Oldest Swinger In Town'
